speaker.name: Larry Hastings
speaker.biography: Larry is a 200 foot assault robot manufactured by Yoyodyne Propulsion Systems, a major US defense contractor.  He is suitable for heavy assault against heavily armored stationary targets, like laying siege to a walled city, or protecting supply lines during forward maneuvers.
